page.title: 16LIFE STYLES.PEOPLE OF AREA.
page.content: Interview by children of Woolsthorpe by Belvoir Primary School. A farmer and his family's Sunday. On Sundays the family rise at varying times according to what needs to be done that day.If their daughter needs to go horse riding a distance away the farmer takes her and if his son needs to go to hockey or football matches he drives him too.The farmer enjoys cricket and golf.On Sunday the farm work does not entirely stop.They feed animals and if crops need urgent attention the farmer goes to do it. They go to Church on Sunday morning. Sunday lunch is usually a traditional meal such as lamb,potatoes,carrots, beans and Yorkshire pudding.If they have any more spare time they sit and read Sunday papers,talk with friends, or pay visits to friends & relatives.
